attributes.action: Increase funding for tinnitus research to guide the way for a cure
attributes.additional_details: The NCBI have records on hyperbaric oxygen tanks , electric stimulation devices , some are available at private clinics but cost too much money, in to the £1000s. The NHS could do this much cheaper and with better impact, some epilepsy drugs might even help. This should and must happen , people live in fear with this condition some better than others, it has been associated with some people taking their own lives, please step up to a new chapter in helping tinnitus suffers get relief.
attributes.background: Tinnitus affects 10% of the UK with it affecting lives badly. Results in some studies have shown promised results hyperbaric oxygen, electric simulation and other possible cures. Funding should be increased to research these.
